        <script><![CDATA[updateButtonInstanceOnCustomization();

function updateButtonInstanceOnCustomization() {
    var buttonInstanceGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.COMMON_TABLES.SYS_SG_BUTTON_INSTANCE);
    if (!isButtonCustomized() && buttonInstanceGr.get(WSDCaseConstants.BUTTON_INSTANCE.NEW_BUTTON_INSTANCE)) {
        buttonInstanceGr.setValue('active', false);
        buttonInstanceGr.update();
    }
}

function isButtonCustomized() {
    return !isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_BUTTON_INSTANCE) && !isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_BUTTON) && !isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_WRITE_BACK_ACTION_ITEM) && 
	!isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_UI_PARAMETER) && !isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_ACTION_PARAM_MAP) && !isRecordCustomized(WSDCaseConstants.IS_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZED.SYS_SG_ITEM_PARAMETER);
} 

function isRecordCustomized(updateName) {
    var sysUpdateXmlGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.COMMON_TABLES.SYS_UPDATE_XML);
    return sysUpdateXmlGr.get('name', updateName);
}]]></script>
